queryMap.query: SELECT B.STND_YEAR ,A.CD ,A.CD_NM ,A.RMK ,C.PART_CD ,C.PART_NM ,D.RATE ,(SELECT MAX(SEQ) FROM TBTQ_CTL_RATE)+1 SEQ ,ROUND(B.POINT,2) AS POINT -- 현재 환산점수 ,B.ORG_POINT -- 점수 ,B.CHK ,A.ORD_NO ,A.CONTENTS ,0 NEW_RATE -- 등록된 비중 ,0 NEW_POINT -- 등록된 환산점수 ,0 POINT_DECLINATION -- 환산점수 편차 ,0 RATE_DECLINATION -- 비중편차 ,'' COMMENTS FROM TBTQ_SPEC_CD A ,( SELECT T1.STND_YEAR,T1.TMS, T1.CD,T1.POINT * (T2.RATE/100) AS POINT,POINT AS ORG_POINT ,CHK FROM ( SELECT STND_YEAR,0.5 TMS,CD,( 100 - CASE WHEN SUM(CNT) * 10 > 50 THEN 50 ELSE SUM(CNT) * 10 END ) AS POINT,0 CHK FROM TBTQ_CTL WHERE CD IN('P01','P03','P04','P05','P07','P10') GROUP BY STND_YEAR,CD ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- UNION SELECT STND_YEAR,0.5 TMS,'P02' CD,ROUND(LEAST(POINT,GOAL) / GOAL * 100,2) AS POINT ,1 CHK FROM ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.CNT/B.TOTAL POINT FROM ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,COUNT(*) CNT FROM USRBM.TBES_SDL_RS A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND A.POOL_CD = '004' AND A.PAYOFF < 10 AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR )A, ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,COUNT(*) TOTAL FROM USRBM.TBES_SDL_RS A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND A.POOL_CD = '004' AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR )T1, ( SELECT (SUM(CNT)/SUM(TOTAL)) * 1.1 AS GOAL FROM( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,A.CNT,B.TOTAL, ROUND((A.CNT/B.TOTAL) * 100 ) POINT FROM ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,COUNT(*) CNT FROM USRBM.TBES_SDL_RS A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND A.POOL_CD = '004' AND A.PAYOFF < 10 AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS )A, ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,COUNT(*) TOTAL FROM USRBM.TBES_SDL_RS A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND A.POOL_CD = '004' AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND B.STND_YEAR BETWEEN ? - 3 AND ? - 1 ) )T2 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- UNION SELECT STND_YEAR,0.5 TMS,CD,100 - NVL((SUM(CNT/TOTALCNT)/COUNT(TMS) * 100),0) AS POINT,0 CHK FROM TBTQ_CTL WHERE CD IN('P06') GROUP BY STND_YEAR,CD UNION SELECT STND_YEAR,0.5 TMS,CD,( 100 - CASE WHEN SUM(CNT) * 1.2 > 50 THEN 50 ELSE SUM(CNT) * 1.2 END ) AS POINT,0 CHK FROM TBTQ_CTL WHERE CD = 'P09' GROUP BY STND_YEAR,CD ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,0.5 TMS,B.CD,ROUND(100 -(B.CNT/A.TOTAL) * 100,2) AS POINT,0 CHK FROM ( SELECT STND_YEAR,COUNT(TMS)AS TOTAL FROM TBEB_RACE WHERE RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY STND_YEAR )A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,CD,SUM(CNT) CNT FROM TBTQ_CTL WHERE CD IN('P08','P11','P12') GROUP BY STND_YEAR,CD )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- UNION SELECT STND_YEAR,0.5 TMS,'P13' CD ,CASE WHEN ROUND((1 - (CNT - 0.45)/0.45) * 100,2) > 100 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((1 - (CNT - 0.45)/0.45) * 100,2) END AS POINT ,1 CHK FROM ( SELECT STND_YEAR,ROUND(SUM(CNT)/ COUNT(*),2) CNT FROM ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.MOT_NO,MAX(A.INTRO_RUN_TM)- MIN(A.INTRO_RUN_TM) AS CNT FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.MOT_NO ) GROUP BY STND_YEAR ) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,0.5 TMS,'Q01' CD,( 100 - CASE WHEN NVL(B.CNT,0) * 10 > 50 THEN 50 ELSE NVL(B.CNT,0) * 10 END ) AS POINT, 1 CHK FROM VWET_SEASON A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,COUNT(*) CNT FROM TBEB_RACE WHERE RACE_STTS_CD IN('002', '003') GROUP BY STND_YEAR )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,B.CNT UNION ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SELECT A.STND_YEAR,0.5 TMS,'Q02' CD ,CASE WHEN GOAL/(CNT/TOTAL * 100) * 100 > 100 THEN 100 WHEN CNT IS NULL THEN 100 ELSE GOAL/(CNT/TOTAL * 100) * 100 END AS POINT,1 CHK FROM ( SELECT STND_YEAR,COUNT(TMS)AS TOTAL FROM TBEB_RACE WHERE RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY STND_YEAR )A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,'Q02' CD,COUNT(TMS) CNT,1 CHK FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE ACDNT_TPE_CD = '003' AND VOIL_CD IN('110','120') GROUP BY STND_YEAR )B, ( -- 목표 SELECT SUM(B.CNT)/SUM(A.TOTAL) * 100 * 0.9 GOAL FROM ( SELECT STND_YEAR,COUNT(STND_YEAR)AS TOTAL FROM TBEB_RACE WHERE RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY STND_YEAR )A, ( SELECT STND_YEAR,COUNT(STND_YEAR) CNT FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE ACDNT_TPE_CD = '003' AND VOIL_CD IN('110','120') GROUP BY STND_YEAR )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.STND_YEAR BETWEEN ? - 3 AND ? - 1 )C WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TOTAL,B.CNT,C.GOAL ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,0.5 TMS,'Q03' CD ,CASE WHEN 100-((COUNT(B.TMS) * 20)/ A.TOTAL * 100) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(100-((COUNT(B.TMS) * 20)/ A.TOTAL * 100),2) END AS POINT,1 CHK FROM ( SELECT STND_YEAR,COUNT(TMS)AS TOTAL FROM TBEB_RACE WHERE RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY STND_YEAR )A, ( SELECT * FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE ACDNT_TPE_CD = '003' AND VOIL_CD IN('995','996','997') )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TOTAL ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,0.5 TMS,'Q04' CD,ROUND( 100 - (COUNT(B.TMS)/A.TOTAL) * 100 ,2) AS POINT,1 CHK FROM ( SELECT STND_YEAR,COUNT(TMS)AS TOTAL FROM TBEB_RACE WHERE RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY STND_YEAR )A, ( SELECT * FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE ACDNT_TPE_CD IN('001','002','004','007','008','010') )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TOTAL ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,0.5 TMS,'Q05' CD,ROUND((1.5 - (SUM(A.STAR_TM)/COUNT(A.STAR_TM))) * 100 * 0.67,2) AS POINT,1 CHK FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,0.5 TMS,'Q06' CD,ROUND((7.5 - SUM(A.INTRO_RUN_TM)/COUNT(A.INTRO_RUN_TM))*100,2) AS POINT,1 CHK FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR,0.5 TMS,'Q07' CD,ROUND(100 - (A.CNT/B.GOAL),2) POINT, 1 CHK FROM ( SELECT STND_YEAR,ROUND(SUM(CNT)/ COUNT(*),3) CNT ,1 CHK FROM ( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,A.DAY_ORD,A.RACE_NO,SUM(A.TIME_DIFF)/2000 AS CNT FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' AND A.RANK IN( 2,3) GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,A.DAY_ORD,A.RACE_NO ) GROUP BY STND_YEAR )A, -- 목표 ( SELECT SUM(CNT)/COUNT(*) * 0.9 GOAL FROM( SELECT A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,A.DAY_ORD,A.RACE_NO,SUM(A.TIME_DIFF)/2000 AS CNT FROM TBEB_ORGAN A,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND B.RACE_STTS_CD = '001' AND A.RANK IN( 2,3) AND A.STND_YEAR BETWEEN ? - 3 AND ? - 1 GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TMS,A.DAY_ORD,A.RACE_NO ) )B ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- UNION SELECT A.STND_YEAR, 0.5 TMS,'Q08' CD,ROUND( 100 - (COUNT(B.TMS)/A.TOTAL) * 100 ,2) AS POINT,1 CHK FROM ( SELECT STND_YEAR, COUNT(*) TOTAL FROM TBEB_ORGAN WHERE ABSE_CD = '001' GROUP BY STND_YEAR )A, ( SELECT * FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE VOIL_CD IN('125','140','150','210','220','999') )B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR,A.TOTAL )T1, TBTQ_CTL_RATE T2 WHERE T1.CD = T2.CD AND T2.SEQ = ? ) B ,TBTQ_PART_CD C ,(SELECT STND_YEAR,CD,RATE,SEQ FROM TBTQ_CTL_RATE WHERE SEQ = ? ) D WHERE A.CD = B.CD(+) AND A.PART_CD = C.PART_CD AND A.CD = D.CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.STND_YEAR = ? ORDER BY ORD_NO,CD,STND_YEAR
SELECT SEQ AS CD,COMMENTS FROM TBTQ_CTL_RATE GROUP BY SEQ,COMMENTS ORDER BY SEQ DESC

MERGE INTO TBTQ_CTL_RATE TCR USING DUAL ON ( TCR.STND_YEAR = ? AND TCR.CD = ? AND TCR.SEQ = ? ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET RATE = ? , GBN ='S' , COMMENTS = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( STND_YEAR , CD , SEQ , RATE , GBN , COMMENTS , INST_ID , INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,'S' ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
